definition.featurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="feature_container" deletable="false" x="273" y="75"><value name="feature"><block type="feature_simple_block"><field name="schedule_tick">TRUE</field><value name="block"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="block">CUSTOM:CarrionCrawlerCocoonInactive</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_count"><comment pinned="false" h="92" w="224">We try to place up to 125 moss patches per chunk</comment><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_constant"><field name="value">5</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is how many times the feature is repeated.</comment></block></value><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="189">We then move each feature horizontally, so that they don't generate in the corner of the chunk</comment><next><block type="placement_height_uniform"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We try to generate at random heights between the bottom of the world and Y=256</comment><value name="min"><block type="vertical_anchor_above_bottom"><field name="value">0</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="vertical_anchor_absolute"><field name="value">256</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_environment_scan_advanced" inline="false"><field name="maxSteps">12</field><field name="direction">UP</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We check up to 12 blocks going up, until we find a solid block</comment><value name="searchCondition"><block type="block_predicate_is_air"></block></value><value name="condition"><block type="block_predicate_solid"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">0</field><field name="z">0</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_offset"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We move the feature up by one block</comment><value name="xz"><block type="int_provider_constant"><field name="value">0</field></block></value><value name="y"><block type="int_provider_constant"><field name="value">-1</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
